showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘Here Lies Love’ is a history lesson wrapped in a tale of broken hearts and presented as engaging songs. It’s a fine alternative to traditional Broadway that’s likely to attract the younger audiences that the theater community desperately needs. If it succeeds, expect to see a lot more similarly crafted musicals in the coming years.”

Read more
